channel.title: Logistics on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Logistics on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Populous (PPT) Logo Populous is a network designed to offer small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) invoice liquidity for up to 90 days. Launched in 2017, Populous is designed to enable peer-to-peer (P2P) interaction between enterprises, boost liquidity and solve problems with working capital for SMEs. By relying on blockchain technology and smart contracts, the Populous network facilitates decentralized communication between businesses and allows them to share liquidity pools. According to the network’s official whitepaper, there is a need for liquidity in the sector, and Populous is trying to bring the solution.
You can download thePopulouslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Populous
item.description: Populous is a network designed to offer small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) invoice liquidity for up to 90 days. Launched in 2017, Populous is designed to enable peer-to-peer (P2P) interaction between enterprises, boost liquidity and solve problems with working capital for SMEs. By relying on blockchain technology and smart contracts, the Populous network facilitates decentralized communication between businesses and allows them to share liquidity pools. According to the network’s official whitepaper, there is a need for liquidity in the sector, and Populous is trying to bring the solution.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Waltonchain (WTC) Logo Waltonchain (WTC) is building an ecosystem that melds blockchain, RFID technology, and IoT (Internet of Things). The Walton team develops and produces Transaction ID-reading RFID chips, which can generate their own random ID hashes that are uploaded simultaneously to the blockchain via their RFID reader. This translates to enhanced operational efficiency, especially for supply chain use cases such high-end clothing identification, food & drug traceability, and logistics tracking. Source
You can download theWaltonchainlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Waltonchain
item.description: Waltonchain (WTC) is building an ecosystem that melds blockchain, RFID technology, and IoT (Internet of Things). The Walton team develops and produces Transaction ID-reading RFID chips, which can generate their own random ID hashes that are uploaded simultaneously to the blockchain via their RFID reader. This translates to enhanced operational efficiency, especially for supply chain use cases such high-end clothing identification, food & drug traceability, and logistics tracking. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
OriginTrail (TRAC) Logo OriginTrail is an Ethereum-based ecosystem for supply chain use cases, founded in 2011. The idea behind the project is to employ the power of blockchain technology in the sphere of logistics and supply chain management. According to the official OriginTrail white paper, the ecosystem provides enterprise users an option to streamline their supply chain, improve item tracking and introduce better data protection practices. As one of the first blockchain solutions introduced on a global scale, OriginTrail has been used by companies in numerous fields, including beef, poultry and vegetable distribution.
You can download theOriginTraillogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.description: OriginTrail is an Ethereum-based ecosystem for supply chain use cases, founded in 2011. The idea behind the project is to employ the power of blockchain technology in the sphere of logistics and supply chain management. According to the official OriginTrail white paper, the ecosystem provides enterprise users an option to streamline their supply chain, improve item tracking and introduce better data protection practices. As one of the first blockchain solutions introduced on a global scale, OriginTrail has been used by companies in numerous fields, including beef, poultry and vegetable distribution.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hyundai Glovis Logo Hyundai Glovis Co., Ltd. is a logistics company headquartered in Seoul, South Korea and part of the Hyundai Kia Automotive Group. Its predecessor company, Hankook Logitech Co. Ltd was formed in February 2001. Hyundai Glovis supplies ocean transportation logistics advice, cargo space, loading/unloading, and packaging services. It changed its name to Hyundai Glovis in June 2003. Source
You can download theHyundai Glovislogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
